org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.entity

Interface HumanInventory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CarriedInventory<Human>, Inventory, Iterable<Inventory>, Nameable

    public interface HumanInventory
extends CarriedInventory<Human>
    Represents the inventory of a Human or Player. Implementors of this interface guarantee that (at a minimum) the following subinventory types can be queried for:
    • CraftingInventory
